product_name: Old Town Twin Heron Tandem Kayak
long_description: Designed to paddle tandem or solo, this fun-to-paddle recreational kayak features the Auto Trim hull that prevents the bow from riding up out of the water when paddling from the solo position.
short_description: Designed to paddle tandem or solo, this fun-to-paddle recreational kayak features the Auto Trim hull that prevents the bow from riding up out of the water when paddling from the solo position.
